channel.title: Making a auto talker (help for u)
channel.description:
Ok if you're looking at this you're gonnamake a anout talker?
Here we go. At the top put. [code]const color = 'white:'; effect = 'shake: '; talk = 'words here';[/code]
next. hit enter and put
[code]procedure auto; begin[/code]
next. under that put [code]sendkeys(color+effect+talk) keydown(13) sleep(1) keyup(13) end;[/code]
now time to add repeats. [code]begin repeat auto; wait(2500) until(false) end[/code]
and now if you want to add a timer here u go! add it up under const and the talk. before begin ^ | [code]procedure time; WriteIn('Auto Talking starts in 5 secs.'); wait(1000) // waits 1 sec. WriteIn('4'); wait(1000) WriteIn('3'); wait(1000) WriteIn('2'); wait(1000) WriteIn('1'); wait(1000) WriteIn('~Starting~'); end;[/code]
you will also need to add this in the repeats like so:
[code]begin time; repeat auto; wait(2500) until(false) end[/code]

item.title: Making a auto talker (help for u)
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

I think making a tutorial on this is good, because a lot of people begin learning scar this way and it helps to learn how a scar script works, but I’d like to say you should add more information on what each line of code is doing and how it works… e.g. “why const is there and what it is used for”

Anyways anyone new to scar should try this!

Read full topic
item.source: Making a auto talker (help for u)

item.title: Making a auto talker (help for u)
item.dc:creator: @Black_pk Black pk
item.description:
@Black_pk wrote:

Ok if you’re looking at this you’re gonnamake a anout talker?

Here we go.
At the top put.

const color = 'white:'; effect = 'shake: '; talk = 'words here';

next. hit enter and put

procedure auto; begin

next. under that put

sendkeys(color+effect+talk) keydown(13) sleep(1) keyup(13) end;

now time to add repeats.

begin repeat auto; wait(2500) until(false) end

and now if you want to add a timer here u go! add it up under const and the talk. before begin ^
|

procedure time; WriteIn('Auto Talking starts in 5 secs.'); wait(1000) // waits 1 sec. WriteIn('4'); wait(1000) WriteIn('3'); wait(1000) WriteIn('2'); wait(1000) WriteIn('1'); wait(1000) WriteIn('~Starting~'); end;

you will also need to add this in the repeats like so:

begin time; repeat auto; wait(2500) until(false) end
